entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain near midnight then to flurries overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
